name: Milk Rush
description:
The Milk Company is a very well known milk company that produces milk. The way their machines work is that they constantly spit out milk cartons and someone has to pick them up before they fall on the floor and lose their selling value. Will you help the milk company maintain its reputation and collect the milk for them?

By tilting your phone/tablet, you move a box across a table to collect milk cartons dropping from conveyor belts.
